issue.title: [Developer] cmake-format pre-commit hook doesn't run
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11180](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11180). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, `entry echo` overwrites the actual command and so nothing gets run

comments.body:
